name: Split of an empire
description:
You have to fight your way through rooms of an old empire. You will switch between two dimensions that has different kinds of enemies. How many rooms can you survive?

Controlls: 

WASD to move

Left mouse to fire

Shift to switch dimension

Space to jump

The theme (Two) is implemented with the two dimensions the player can switch between.

Some people in the group were beginners and some were not.

Made with Unity
